project_descr: PPG phase for "Enhancing Sustainability and Climate Resilience of Forest and Agricultural landscape and community livelihoods" project.

outputs.output_descr:
Full size project document on "Enhancing Sustainability and Climate Resilience of Forest and Agricultural landscape and community livelihoods in Bhutan" developed. 

Key outputs are;
Institutional capacity enhanced for integrated forest and agricultural landscape management with introduction of landscape approach and strengthened land use compliance monitoring and enforcement system.

Biodiversity conditions and carbon stock monitoring system institutionalized under the national forest inventory, with introduction of HCVF approach

Two target biological corridors and PA/corridor landscape esta

document_name: Annex 14  Climate Change Vulnerability and Adaptation Planning Report1
Value Chain and Market Analysis Report
